## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm curious about mining in the Verus ecosystem. How do I control who mines my project within the Verus ecosystem?

**AI Assistant:**
Within the Verus ecosystem, miners are encouraged to participate in mining projects that are interesting and profitable. You can even motivate them further by adding some $VRSC to the project. This implies that miners are free to participate in mining your project, rather than needing permission to do so. So, you don't really "control" who mines your project, but you can make it more attractive to miners by offering incentives.

**User:**
That makes sense. Another question I had is, is it possible to pre-mine a project in the Verus ecosystem?

**AI Assistant:**
Yes, it is possible to pre-mine a project in the Verus ecosystem. You can choose to receive a pre-mine, specifying the amount you want, before your Kickstarter launch. This can be a good way to get a head start on your project and ensure that it gets the attention it needs. Do you have any other questions about mining or pre-mining in Verus?
